function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Online questionnaire distribution to the general public during a pandemic","Impact":"Potential spread of misinformation or manipulation of responses","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accurate information about the survey purpose and data handling","Technologies":"Secure data storage and encryption for respondent privacy","People":"General public","Owner":"Researchers conducting the survey"},{"Description":"Data collection concurrent with COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Potential exposure of data collectors and respondents to the virus","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety measures for data collection, including PPE and physical distancing","Technologies":"Contactless data collection methods where possible (e.g., online surveys)","People":"Data collectors, respondents","Owner":"Researchers conducting the survey"},{"Description":"Restrictions on UGS visitation during the pandemic","Impact":"Impact on respondents' access to nature and outdoor spaces","Mitigation":"Provide alternative ways for respondents to connect with nature, e.g., virtual tours or online resources","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology for immersive nature experiences","People":"UGS visitors, non-UGS visitors","Owner":"Researchers conducting the survey"}]}
